jyzer.items.constantpool
Class ConstantPoolInfo

java.lang.Object
  jyzer.items.constantpool.ConstantPoolInfo
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractReference, ConstantClassInfo, ConstantDoubleInfo, ConstantDummyInfo, ConstantFloatInfo, ConstantIntegerInfo, ConstantLongInfo, ConstantNameAndTypeInfo, ConstantStringInfo, ConstantUtf8Info
public abstract class ConstantPoolInfo
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract superclass for all of the constant_pool entries. Unknown entries are handled with CONSTANT_Dummy.

About the tags:
Here's a little list about the available tags, and with my extension.

CONSTANT_Class 7
CONSTANT_Fieldref 9
CONSTANT_Methodref 10
CONSTANT_InterfaceMethodref 11
CONSTANT_String 8
CONSTANT_Integer 3
CONSTANT_Float 4
CONSTANT_Long 5
CONSTANT_Double 6
CONSTANT_NameAndType 12
CONSTANT_Utf8 1
CONSTANT_Dummy 0

Version:
1.0, 2005 nov 4.
Author:
Legendi Richard Oliver

getHTMLDescription

public abstract void getHTMLDescription(java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
Concatenates a HTML string that represents this class ( looks cool! ) to the end of the given StringBiulder object. Using this method for improve efficiency, cause I had a lot of problems with displaying such a long HTML text in an EditorPane.

Parameters:
sb - a StringBuilder that contains the string representation of the full classfile.
